nodes.text: The father of the holostar Javul Charn and her brother, Ayx, served in the Republic Navy during the final years of the Galactic Republic. Following the rise of the Galactic Empire, he and his partner became musicians and secretly used their tours of the Mid and Outer Rim to run information between resistance cells. Both he and his partner were killed in an Imperial raid while performing at a venue on Bothawui.
